documents.document: Nothing annoys me more than when middle aged men tell me I should smile more in my pictures

I really need to start taking my own advice

RT @brielarson: An unconscious person cannot give consent. If you do not want to be a rapist, wait until you can get conscious consent.
I've had to wake up so early for the last few days and I actually am really enjoying it
Animals are the best
Getting another dog is the best thing to happen in my life for years honestly
I've been overthinking everything way too much lately
I hate when you know you have to do something that you really don't want to do and it makes your whole day feel off
I'm sitting outside in the sun drinking coffee while my puppy sleeps on my lap. This is what happiness is.
The smell of meat cooking makes me feel so sick

I've done everything I have to do today and it's only 11:30 am
I just had two breakfasts because I couldn't decide between avocado toast and rawnola with fruit
Both of my big sisters are living in different countries now and I miss them so much
I've been so tired all day
I just made the most delicious vegan pumpkin spice muffins and now my whole house smells like fall
this rainy weather makes me want to stay in bed all day
@AshtinMcfadden it is the most frustrating thing ever I hate it so much

@nicolefdoug YES
My puppy is always waiting for me at the door when I get home from work and she's so happy and cuddly and I love her so much
It's only 4pm and I'm ready to go to bed
I've changed a lot this year and it's all been such positive and healthy changes and it really has made all the difference
Everything is just going so well lately
I've been watching a lot of food documentaries lately and I can't stress enough how important it is to educate yourself about this stuff
I'm cutting my hair again soon and actually think I'm going to go a lot shorter this time
I'm going to buy all the sweaters I can find when I get back to the city
This fall weather is the best
I'm addicted to coconut milk lattes
I'm so in love with my dog
starting a new job is exhausting
This has felt like the longest day
@kylehhh yes move here please
I love mornings so much
I'm so happy
finally moving on

I basically pretend it's fall all year round

so many things are about to change

I'm such a morning person now I love it
I'm having the best morning
